headline: Analyst Says Disney (DIS) Should ‘Shut Down’ ABC, Thinks It’s ‘Shrinking Every Year’
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks to Watch as Investors Scramble to Pour Money into AI Trade. The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS) is one of the stocks that caught analysts’ attention. headline: Bryan Castellani, Former Disney, ESPN and Warner Music Executive, Joins Genius Sports as Chief Financial Officer
summary: NEW YORK, October 01, 2025--Genius Sports Limited ("Genius Sports") (NYSE:GENI), the official data, technology and broadcast partner powering the global sports, betting and media ecosystem, today formally welcomes Bryan Castellani as Chief Financial Officer, effective immediately.

content.title: Bryan Castellani, Former Disney, ESPN and Warner Music Executive, Joins Genius Sports as Chief Financial Officer
content.summary: NEW YORK, October 01, 2025--Genius Sports Limited ("Genius Sports") (NYSE:GENI), the official data, technology and broadcast partner powering the global sports, betting and media ecosystem, today formally welcomes Bryan Castellani as Chief Financial Officer, effective immediately.

headline: Fresh Del Monte Teams Up with Disney’s "Zootopia 2" in a Global Campaign to Bring Over 500 Million Co-branded Fruit Stickers to Grocery Stores
summary: CORAL GABLES, Fla., October 01, 2025--Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc. (NYSE: FDP), a global leader in fresh and fresh-cut fruit and vegetables, is teaming up with Disney’s "Zootopia 2" to launch a 360-degree campaign celebrating the release of the film, which comes out November 26, featuring the comeback duo of Judy Hopps (voiced by Ginnifer Goodwin) and Nick Wilde (voiced by Jason Bateman).
